summary: When a cop's partner is killed in the line of duty, he assumed guardianship of his orphaned children while investigating the murder.
cast: Shah Rukh Khan|Juhi Chawla|Jackie Shroff|Nirmal Pandey|Dilip Joshi|Sahila Chaddha|Suresh Chatwal|Bharat Dabholkar|Baby Gazala|Akash Khurana|Madhur Mittal|Amar Pawaskar|Fatima Sana Shaikh|Keith Stevenson|Raj Zutshi|Jack Gaud
title: One 2 Ka 4
